messages.body:
August 25, 2005 

Mr. Henry, 

I can't tell you how happy I am that you and your organization exist and are there to help people like myself. I wish nothing but the best to you and your department and I am prepared to offer any help I can to shag these rascals.

I am sorry to say that I no longer have the complete documentation of the deal with the fraudstars. Much of it was destroyed in a fit of rage when I discovered that I had been swindled by these hudlums. I will offer what I have and can remember.

1. Telephone number of the fraudstars - They gave me a number but I never used it as they always called me. I have not been able to locate it yet but will continue to search.

2. Their Addresses - Same thing. I may have it somewhere and will continue to look for it. 

3. Amount lost - $17,500. 

Bank: Dresdnerbank Ag, 
Hamburg Germany. 
BLZ : 200 800 00 
Account Name: Konpart Gmbh 
A/C: 03204 89300 
Beneficiary: O. I . T. C 

5. Master Copy and Payment Schedule - I'm not sure what you need here. There was no payment schedule as such, just a demand that I send the money to the above account.

For your reference: 

1. My name - Lewis D. Noogie 
2. Address - at the time of the swindle I was residing at: : c/o Hui Tebya Hotel, Novosibirsk, Latvia 

3. Current Address: c/o Zayebis Hotel and Resort, Gadyukina, Kurgan Oblast, Russian Federation 
Tel: 7-095-964-8597 
Fax: n/a 
Email: ***********@*******.com 

3. Passport - I am currently consulting to a small resort hotel here in Russia and they do not have a scanner. If you will tell me what information you require from my passport I will be happy to send it to you by email.

Please don't hesitate to contact me if there is any other information you require. Once again let me say that I'm quite pleased you're after those rapscallions.

Sincerely, 
Lewd Noogie
